front.title: PacketCable Security Ticket Control Sub-Option for the DHCP CableLabs Client Configuration (CCC) Option

abstract.t: This document defines a new sub-option for the DHCP CableLabs Client Configuration (CCC) Option. This new sub-option will be used to direct CableLabs Client Devices (CCDs) to invalidate security tickets stored in CCD non volatile memory (i.e., locally persisted security tickets). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
